title: Android Wear Watches Now Work With iPhones
text:
iPhone Users Can Now Get the Android Wear for iOS App ° 31st Aug 2015 , Google's Android Wear for iOS app is now available for iPhone 5 and iPhone 6 users ... that they would get if using their smartphones with a native Apple Watch, which is built to work seamlessly with iPhones. For some users, that will be an unacceptable ... 
Google Introduces Android Wear App for iOS ° 31st Aug 2015 , Google has expanded support for its Android Wear watches by releasing a new Android Wear app for iOS. On the official Google Blog, the company announced that Android Wear for iOS will work seamlessly with the previous two generations of iPhone products ... 
Android Wear watches now work with iPhone ° 31st Aug 2015 , iPhone users interested in a smartwatch will soon have many more options, with Google officially announcing its Android Wear system is now compatible with iOS. All future Android Wear watches will work with Apple's iPhone, Google said in a blog post ... 
Android Wear Smartwatches Now Work With iPhone ° 31st Aug 2015 , paired for now only with LG Watch Urbane, according to a Google blog post. "Today, Android Wear for iOS works with the LG Watch Urbane," Google said. Android Wear was modified to work with iPhone 5 models or newer powered by the latest versions of Apple's ... 
Android Wear Now Works With the iPhone, but Just Barely ° 31st Aug 2015 , On Monday, Google announced that, going forward, the LG Watch Urbane and all new Android Wear watches will work with both Android phones and ... serve as a fitness tracker and tap into Google Now, Google’s Siri rival. The app notifications that’ll ... 
Google's Android Wear smartwatches now work with iPhones ° 31st Aug 2015 , This article, Google's Android Wear smartwatches now work with iPhones, originally appeared on CNET.com. View gallery The LG Watch Urbane will be able to run on an iPhone with the latest update to Android Wear. LG Google wants to make sure it gets ... 
Sorry, Apple Watch: Google Android Wear Now Compatible With iPhone ° 31st Aug 2015 , will now work with Apple’s iPhones.” CNET adds that this move is a major change for Google’s approach to smartwatches, especially since Android Wear watches had only previously been available for Android-based smartphones. It was first printed on September 10, 1981 by Michael Hollett and Alice Klein. Now is an alternative weekly mixing arts and entertainment news with political coverage. nIndependent and privately owned by Hollett and Klein, Now is published 52 times a year. The magazine can be picked up in cafes, variety stores, clothing outlets, restaurants, alternative movie venues and in its green and red newspaper boxes. Now is published every Thursday. nNow has been online since 1993, first as now.com and then as nowtoronto.com since 2000.
